description: Winter Study of CVLAB@SNU in Preparation for ECCV 2016
README.md:
# Winter Study
Winter Study of Computer Vision Lab at Seoul National University. 

Organizer: Myungsub Choi, Jiwon Kim

Members: Jiwon Kim, Myungsub Choi, Jung Kwon Lee, Janghoon Choi (Let Jiwon know if interested to join)

# Plan 
## Conference track

1. ICCV 2015 reading
2. NIPS 2015 reading
3. ICLR 2016 (submission) reading
4. CVPR 2016 (submission) reading 
5. arXiv misc. 


## ML Study
### Textbooks (tentatively, up to 16/1/31) 
1. Kevin Murphy, Machine Learning - A Probabilistic Perspective (https://mitpress.mit.edu/books/machine-learning-0)
2. Ian Goodfellow, Aaron Courville, Yoshua Bengio, Deep Learning (https://goodfeli.github.io/dlbook/)

## Lectures

1. Deep Learning Summer School Videos
2. CS231n, CS224d
3. David Silver RL lectures
4. Oxford Machine Learning Course


## Code Practice

### Framework Study
1. Tensorflow
2. Torch
3. Theano
4. Programming practice - making examples (cf. simple cnn/rnn examples, spatial transformer, etc.)
